Thanks for all the wonderful responses...I knew it was mostly for drama and=
 entertainment puroposes(the show I mean)...but was curious about how ya'll=
 did your investigations.=A0 Ive done some stuff around my apartment comple=
x before(we have had lots of people pass over the years this place has stoo=
d, so Ive seen a few iteresting things and have heard some too...but I dont=
 think Ive ever cussed or ran from anything...if Im asking for a sign or re=
sponse and i get something my reaction is usually somewhere in the neighbor=
hood of wooohooooo and politeness...guess I figure treat others how you wan=
t to be treated even if they are spirits.=A0 Anyways, thanks again!
=A0
Rho=

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Thanks for all the wonderful responses...I knew it was mostly for drama and entertainment puroposes(the show I mean)...but was curious about how ya'll did your investigations.  Ive done some stuff around my apartment complex before(we have had lots of people pass over the years this place has stood, so Ive seen a few iteresting things and have heard some too...but I dont think Ive ever cussed or ran from anything...if Im asking for a sign or response and i get something my reaction is usually somewhere in the neighborhood of wooohooooo and politeness...guess I figure treat others how you want to be treated even if they are spirits.  Anyways, thanks again!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Rhonda</DIV></td></tr></table><br>
